comments_since_last_sample.body: I am not a scientist but i have intellect to differentiate between actual knowledge abd prententious one. Doesnt take much but only critical thinking and mind free of religious dogma.

Before trying to know who or what God is, have we known who we are ?
That has been man's problem ? In the process of knowing God, we have created innumerable religions with all kinds of belief systems and commandments and millions of people have been slaughtered and massacred in the name of religion ! 

In Hindu culture, seeking existential truths is the basis ; here it is full of  debates and discussions ; even the realised Spiritual Masters in this culture could only be a guide post  and it is for the spiritual aspirant to walk alone, throwing away all the crutches and realise existential truths for himself, by himself, unless such a one was already an highly exhalted soul needing just a nudge from his Master to reach his goal or becoming one without a second !
